Chelsea Lose away to Southampton

  • Achu-ulim Agbama
  • 8/30/2022, 9:41:00 PM
  • Sports

CHELSEA suffered their second defeat in three matches as Southampton beat them 2-1 at St Mary's on Tuesday night.Thomas Tuchel's side have had a mixed start to their Premier League campaign, with wins over Everton and Leicester accompanied by a draw with Spurs and 3-0 defeat to Leeds. The first defeat for the blue side.the whistle goes, and that’s a fine comeback win for the impressive Saints, who were one of the pre-season tips for relegation, but if the early matches are anything to go by, don’t look like an outfit destined for trouble.
